overview:
Steve is currently serving on the boards of two public companies funded by SRF, Cytokinetics and Citrix. He also sits on the boards of Alder Pharmaceuticals, Kabira, Limerick Neurosciences, Plectix Biosystems, and RNT.

Steve’s goal is to treat entrepreneurs the same way he preferred to be treated when he led Ansa and Calera. “We try to get involved in businesses we believe will last,” he says. “Then we put a lot of time and care into each relationship. But we don’t lose sight of our primary role: helping the management to be successful.”
